name: Google Developers Community Roadshow
description:
Google Developers team is hitting the road in June! The colorful community bus will stop in
Tallinn on 4th June.
Join the #CommunityRoadshow​ to find out how Google supports developers around the
world. Meet community members, take part in workshops and have fun with live music and
games on site. Want to join? Sign up here! https://bit.ly/communityroadshow
More information about event here: https://bit.ly/2J0F0Yw

Команда Google Developers отправляется в путь в июне ! Наш яркий и заметный автобус будет ждать вас в Таллинне 4го июня !
Присоединяйтесь к #CommunityRoadshow, чтобы узнать как Google поддерживает разработчиков по всему миру. У вас будет возможность встретиться с участниками различных сообществ, принять участие в воркшопах, играх и немного повеселиться, послушать живую музыку.
Хотите принять участие ? Регистрируйтесь тут: https://bit.ly/communityroadshow
Больше информации о евенте - https://bit.ly/2J0F0Yw

name: Google Women Techmakers takes off in Tallinn
description:
Empowering women in Tech.

Google Women Techmakers (WTM) is a non-profit organisation striving to help women in technology and beyond in their endeavours in all parts of the world. Now we are happy to announce that from now on WTM is taking off in Tallinn to give learning and networking opportunities. We also welcome men from all those fields to inspire, assist and get involved. The community aims to create a professional network of women working or studying in technology and related fields and create an environment for learning and sharing knowledge. Join the event dedicated to the official and public launch of the Google Women Techmakers branch in Tallinn, Estonia.
We want to give each and every member of our community an opportunity to make a difference, hence regardless of your gender, come and share your ideas or get inspiration, knowledge and opportunities from others.

Your expectations for the event:
- Hear more about Women Techmakers and its purpose
- A story of a WTM lead Minsk (BY) Olha Anfilova
- A speech by Triin Mahlakõiv (North Star AI)
- A statement by Maarja Pehk (the head organiser for Latitude59)
- A talk by Ksenia Niglas (PhD student of Mathematics Education at University of Cambridge)
- A discussion by Julia Jolkin (owner of IT Talent Estonia)
- Extensive networking event with welcoming aperitive
- Share your opinion on the ways you want to be empowered

Entrance to the event is for free.

Stay tuned for the details! We will announce the agenda soon.
We are excited and cannot wait to see you, wonderful people, at the gathering!

name: Firebase meetup with Googlers
description:
We are very pleasured to welcome Googlers Megha Bangalore and Shannon McCabe in Tallinn for a Firebase meetup.

We will discuss what's new in Firebase and for all who interested organize Getting started with Firebase introductory talk.

Megha is a Technical Lead at Google working on making Firebase great. Her career has been focused on backend engineering, from building a highly distributed log management and SIEM platform to working on distributed systems at Twitter and then Google. Her number one focus is to help Firebase users engage and delight their users. A Silicon Valley native, Megha received her Master of Arts in CS from Oxford University. She is an avid skier and enjoys writing in her spare time.

Shannon is a member of the Firebase Developer Relations team, where she writes documentation and works on the Firebase Console. She enjoys learning about new technologies and services so that she can go on to teach others. Shannon's main goal is to keep Firebase docs short, useful, and relevant, to help developers spend less time reading and more time building cool stuff.

Welcome it will be really interesting !

name: DevClub.eu meeting (Rus)
description:
We will host an event with DevClub.eu team
Details https://www.facebook.com/events/567986416980271/

Регистрируемся здесь: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/123-tickets-53005335385

*Константин Золотарев*
*Making a smart car with Elixir*

Что такое Can Bus? Как подключиться? Как работать? Какие проблемы могут возникнуть? Как не схлопотать подушкой безопасности по лицу? Почему именно Elixir? Чем он так хорошо подходит? Как эмулировать устройства? Как работать с несуществующими устройствами? Как всё это тестировать?

*Илья Нафигин*
*Гибкий API для вашего сервера*

Сейчас REST считается стандартом при создании API. Настолько ли он гибок? В состоянии ли подстраиваться под часто меняющиеся требования со стороны мобильных приложений? Давайте рассмотрим альтернативную технологию GraphQL, ведь у нее есть большие шансы вскоре стань новым стандартом.

*Андрей Солнцев*
*Чем различаются интернет-банк физиков и юриков*

Казалось бы, какая разница? Те же самые счета, платежи, обмен валюты. Ну что там может быть такого? А оказывается, там целая вселенная. Различается буквально всё, начиная от требований по производительности и заканчивая совершенно другой психологией пользователей.

name: Doug Sillars talk  "Fast and beautiful images"

venue.name: Park Inn by Radisson Meriton Conference & Spa Hotel Tallinn (Estonia)

description:
Doug Sillars (GDE, Performance Expert and Developer Advocate)
https://dougsillars.com/

Doug will give a talk about:
“Fast and Beautiful Images” - the best ways to build images for all of the screens/devices that are out there.

Note: Place will be added a bit later.
